__e: Well, you were right about one thing, Ticktin.
You were right about one thing...
You were right about the Denver Doctor of Death. You were just mistaken about which doctor it was.
Hey, um... you were right about something.
And you're right about the city.
And I know you were right about the whole New Power thing, ...
You were right to do what you did.
I'm not going to even pretend to know how you did what you did, but you were right.
Nothing _BAR_ mean if you know you were right then why that sullen face...?
You say this happened two day's ago?
No, you said it was just you and me.
But this isn't - You, you said -
You said he was ours after the last meeting.
You said earlier that he'd never hurt her.
You said he was like a father to you.
But sir, you've been telling us not to!
He told me what you said to him.
Now, I know you and your mom had your struggles...
He said you two were having problems.
I remember you saying that you were having problems at home, too.
I'm sure you had friends, family, or someone we could talk to.
I told you you needed me.
It's not like you need any more!
I was just thinking about you and wanted to see if you needed anything.
No, but it's not like you need a password to get in here.
I know, it just seemed like you could use a friend.
Well, it's not like you've really needed one before, right?
I was just thinking about you and wanted to see if you needed anything.
I know you've needed one, but I'm not very good at all of that.
It's not like you need any more!
I knew you were having an affair, but not in my house.
Well, you were having an affair with her when she died.
And this was a woman with whom you were having an affair.
Oh, I didn't realize you two had a relationship.
I was told you had a relationship with her.
So the man with whom you were having an affair wasn't a man at all. He was a woman.
I didn't know that you had a wife and kids.
We understand that you have a car.
I didn't even know you had a daughter.
I heard you had a little, uh, you were just out there.
Maybe if you guys had a little bit of it, you wouldn't be in this mess in the first place... and then we wouldn't be standing here tryin' to figure out which one of you we have to kill.
If you had any sense, where both of you should be!
And you had a problem with that?
If you had problems with me, why didn't you just talk to me?
I ju thought you guys wod have a problem with that.
I didn't know you had one.
If you had problems with me, why didn't you just talk to me?
